name: Cheese and Herb Omelette
short_description: A classic omelette filled with cheese and fresh herbs.
long_description: Cheese and Herb Omelette is a classic breakfast option that features fluffy eggs filled with melted cheese and a medley of fresh herbs. This quick and customizable dish is perfect for a hearty and satisfying breakfast.
ingredients: Herbs (such as chives or parsley, 2 tbsp, chopped)
instructions: Whisk eggs and season with salt and pepper.
Pour into a hot, greased pan.
Cook until the eggs are set, then fold and serve.
